g.text: Can you fully block access for this persona?
Can you require a compliant device?
Can you use an IP allowlist, IP
Enthusiastic but becomes to complicated? Contact me!
Decision flow: For each persona in your environment (each group of users [regular
users, ADM users, DEV users, specific types of service account]). Try to be as specific as
Can you require MFA for this persona?
Can you require a device ID?
Can you require a device Operating System?
